meanings.definition: A colorless, flammable gas used as a fuel and in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory stored ethenes in tanks for making plastic products.
meanings.sent2: I could smell the ethenes when I passed by the gas station.
meanings.sent3: The ethenes decided to have a race to see who could reach the plastic factory first.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed like ethenes, shaping the future of the plastic industry.
meanings.sent5: The ethenes danced in the air, ready to be transformed into useful materials.

meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a double bond between two carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study ethenes to understand their unique chemical structure.
meanings.sent2: The textbook explained the properties of ethenes in detail.
meanings.sent3: The ethenes at the party were always the center of attention with their bond jokes.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like ethenes, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the ethenes reacted with other compounds to form new substances.
